enWisdom: Having a good intention brings about reward
Righteous intention is one of the two actions
The closest intentions to success are those that are nearest to righteousness

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَعَالَى يُدْخِلُ بِحُسْنِ النِّيَّةِ وَصَالِحِ السَّرِيرَةِ مَنْ يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْجَنَّةَ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Exalted, makes whomever He wishes, from those of his servants who posses sincere intentions and righteous hearts, enter Paradise
Having a good intention is a means of attaining one’s aspiration
Good intention is the beauty of the innermost consciences
Good intention is from the soundness of [one’s] conscience

Wisdom: عَوِّدْ نَفْسَكَ حُسْنَ النِّيَّةِ وَجَمِيلَ الْمَقْصَدِ تُدْرِكْ فِي مَبَاغِيكَ النَّجَاحَ
enWisdom: Habituate yourself to good intention and virtuous purpose, you will attain success in your aspirations (or endeavours)
One who thinks positively [about others], his intention becomes good

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَتْ نِيَّتُهُ كَثُرَتْ مَثُوبَتُهُ وَطَابَتْ عِيشَتُهُ وَوَجَبَتْ مَوَدَّتُهُ
enWisdom: One whose intention is good, his reward is increased, his life becomes good and affection for him becomes inevitable
One whose intention is good is assisted with God-given success

Wisdom: مَا أَعْطَى اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الْعَبْدَ شَيْئاً مِنْ خَيْرِ الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ إِلَّا بِحُسْنِ خُلُقِهِ وَحُسْنِ نِيَّتِهِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, does not give a servant anything from the good of this world or the Hereafter but because of his good character and his good intention

Wisdom: وُصُولُ الْمَرْءِ إِلَى كُلِّ مَا يَبْتَغِيهِ مِنْ طِيبِ عَيْشِهِ وَأَمْنِ سَرْبِهِ وَسَعَةِ رِزْقِهِ بِحُسْنِ نِيَّتِهِ وَسَعَةِ خُلُقِهِ
enWisdom: A person’s attainment of all that he wishes for, such as a good life, the security of his flock and an increase in wealth, is through the goodness of his intention and excellence of his character
